1.content:
"NI CHIN CHAU POT!" you yell, furiously throwing the report to the ground. "I don't BELIEVE it!"

Your outburst has startled the crew, but you would think they would be used to such things by now. You have been Commander of the Battrestal Garactica for nearly fifteen years after all, and were known for your irascible nature during the War. Not that these green rookie recruits would remember the War. They probably didn't even remember Han Dynasty!

"What's the matter, Commander?!" asked Onions, a fiery passion in his eyes.

Wordlessly, you kick the report over to him. Its contents are disheartening.

CONFIRMED ANNIHILATION OF PLANETS TIANSHA AND DIJIAO,
COMMUNICATIONS BLACKOUT OF LOWER FINDLEKICKS
DR. SKIPPER CLAIMS RESPONSIBILITY

You look out over the deep fabric of stars that is space, the final frontier. A frontier that is protected only by you, The Commander! Now Dr. Skipper has returned after his defeat in the War, and it is up to you and your loyal lieutenant Onions to stop him and keep the galaxy safe for social harmony!

In your infinite wisdom, there are a myriad of options available to you. Here's two:
1.title: The Beginning

info.brief_description: Dr. Skipper readies his army of moles to once again cancel the grams of the MOLAR Mass.
info.description:
This is an interactive story where you try and stop the evil Dr. Skipper from doing loads of evil things. Everything should be done towards this goal, though our hero might sometimes forget about it. Content might be gory but probably won't get sexually mature.

Don't think that any option you choose will have the intended affect. This story will probably be really, really arbitrary.
info.pretty_title: War with the Evil Dr. Skipper
